Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Miniature vase in the shape of an oval-shaped jar with a long neck and slightly misshapen foot. The base is flat and circular, the body asymmetrical and bulging, the long neck slightly flaring at the top. Crudely manufactured, there are accumulations of clay on certain parts of the body.
